title: # 327 - Brooks Wheelan & ME
description:
I sit down with Brooks Wheelan to talk about getting fired from SNL, working as a biomedical engineer, getting arrested, his breakup, our favorite music, and much more!

Check out his podcast "Entry Level"

Check out his album "This is cool right?"

This episode is brought to you by Square Space. For a free trial go to www.squarespace.com and use the offer code “Bertcast” and save 10% on your first purchase of a website or domain. 

This episode is also brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Quip. Get your first refill pack for free when you order a Quip electric toothbrush at www.getquip.com/bert 

This episode is also brought to you by Joybird. Create the furniture that brings you joy at www.joybird.com/bertcast and receive 25% off your first order by using the promo code "Bertcast"

This episode is also brought to you by Robinhood. Buy and sell stocks with the Robinhood app. Right now Robinhood is giving listeners a free stock like Apple, Ford, or Sprint to help build your portfolio. Go to www.Bertcast.robinhood.com and sign up today.

Tickets to my “Body Shots” world tour are on sale now!

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
